code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useForm}from'react-hook-form';import{useNavigate,useSearchParams,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../../hooks/useAuth';import classes from'./loginPage.module.css';import Title from'../../components/Title/Title';import Input from'../../components/Input/Input';import Button from'../../components/Button/Button';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function LoginPage(){const{handleSubmit,register,formState:{errors}}=useForm();const navigate=useNavigate();const{user,login}=useAuth();const[params]=useSearchParams();const returnUrl=params.get('returnUrl');useEffect(()=>{if(!user)return;returnUrl?navigate(returnUrl):navigate('/');},[user]);const submit=async _ref=>{let{email,password}=_ref;await login(email,password);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.container,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.details,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{title:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit(submit),noValidate:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"email",label:"Email",...register('email',{required:true,pattern:/^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+\/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9](?:[a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9])?(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9](?:[a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9])?)*$/}),error:errors.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"password",label:"Password",...register('password',{required:true}),error:errors.password}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",text:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.register,children:["New user? \xA0",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register".concat(returnUrl?'?returnUrl='+returnUrl:''),children:"Register here"})]})]})]})});}
